TopicTitle: Dynamic resizing windows for parts descriptions

Articles.Content:
Due to system performance issues, I keep my KSP window below maximum size for my monitor.

As a result of the increasing sophistication of parts, and the verbosity of some (especially mod) developers, the information included has become more lengthy in many cases, and the information windows that appear at mouseover in the parts catalog sometimes get cut off on the top and bottom.

These mouseover popup windows need to be sensitive to the game window height and become wider when necessary to fit the text within the available height and not get cut off.

I can see instances where this wouldn't work, such as descriptions that make use of several line breaks that push the window height. There might be some way to impose a rule in the developer guidelines to prevent this from happening, too.
